item.title: QuoteMania - My Big Project! Thoughts
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh123 pkerjosh123
item.description:
@pkerjosh123 wrote:

Okay so for the past few weeks i been working a website called quotemania

Quote mania is a website in witch people can view images of quotes and what not, so far i have integrated a few social features like commenting and liking images, im currently working on a upload feature for users to upload!

125mg6u.png948×768

[code]<?php

$folder = ‘’;

// Space seperated list of extensions, you probably won’t have to change this.
$exts = ‘jpg jpeg png gif’;

$files = array(); $i = -1; // Initialize some variables
if (’’ == $folder) $folder = ‘./’;

$handle = opendir($folder);
$exts = explode(’ ‘, $exts);
while (false !== ($file = readdir($handle))) {
foreach($exts as $ext) { // for each extension check the extension
if (preg_match(’/.’.$ext.’$/i’, $file, $test)) { // faster than ereg, case insensitive
$files[] = $file; // it’s good
++$i;
}
}
}
closedir($handle); // We’re not using it anymore
mt_srand((double)microtime()*1000000); // seed for PHP < 4.2
$rand = mt_rand(0, $i); // $i was incremented as we went along

header('Location: '.$folder.$files[$rand]); // Voila!
?>[/code]

Randomized image script im working on!

Read full topic
